On [[16 November]] [[1971]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Miss Fay Darrington'''.<ref name=Deweatts>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=http://www.dreweatts.com/cms/pages/lot/36158/453|articlename=Lot No:453, Important Books and Works on Paper | 13 November 2014|dated=|website=[http://www.dreweatts.com www.dreweatts.com]|accessed=02 November 2014}}</ref>

*'''Publication:''' None.
*'''Description:''' One page, printed heading, handwritten signed letter.

==From the auction==

Autograph Note signed to Fay Darrington,1p., 8vo, n.p, 16th November, 1971, thanking her for her letter, returning two books signed and sending her a copy of the new Hobbit map poster.

==See also==
*[[Letter to Fay Darrington (16 February 1972)]]
